data.title: The Top 10 Best Jewellers In Bangalore
data.meta_description: Discover the top 10 best jewellers in Bangalore. From exquisite sets to unique designs, find trusted quality and personalised service for your jewellery needs.
data.text:
Welcome to the world of glittering gold, sparkling diamonds, and exquisite craftsmanship! Bangalore, the Silicon Valley of India, is home to some of the most talented and skilled jewellers in the country. Bangalore jewellers have consistently raised the bar for fine craftsmanship, making them stand out in the world of jewellery. Without further Adieu, let’s dive into the top 10 best jewellers in Banglore.

In 1869, Cotha Krishniah Chetty started a small jewellery enterprise in Bangalore, foreseeing the potential for success in the jewellery business. The founder of the jewellery business made a smart choice by opening it in the centre of the British Cantonment. This way, the business could compete with London’s top jewellers, work together with them, and learn from their high-quality standards.

The jewellery house has established itself as one of the most trusted and respected names in the industry. The people of Banglore didn’t just accept them as their favourite jewellers through legacy alone, the Chetty group of Jewellers offered a wide range of high-quality jewellery, including traditional and contemporary designs, and are known for their personalized service and attention to customer needs.

If you are in search of a jewellery store that offers great quality at reasonable prices, Sree Balaji Jewellers on Avenue Road is a must-visit destination. Although they may not have the big name recognition of some other shops, they have been a part of the local community for many years, offering a personalized and authentic shopping experience.

They have a fixed percentage for making charges and wastage charges, providing transparent pricing to their customers. Moreover, their commitment to quality is evident as all their jewellery comes with a hallmark. The hallmarking process may take an extra day, but the wait is worth it, as you’ll be sure to take home a piece of jewellery that will retain its shine for years to come. Our research proved that a customer’s jewellery shines even after 8 years from purchase. So undoubtedly, you can’t go wrong choosing Sri Balaji Jewellers against prominent big names in the market.

With designs that capture the beauty of Indian women’s special occasions, Tanishq aims to be an integral part of their journey. The brand has revolutionized the Indian jewellery market with innovations like the Karatmeter to check the purity of gold and strict quality checks on all materials. Their commitment to customer satisfaction and product excellence has made Tanishq the most trusted and most popular jewellery brand in India, with over 200 stores across the country.

Discover the unparalleled elegance and beauty of Malabar Gold & Diamonds, the leading jewellery store in Sivanchetti Gardens, Bengaluru. With a wide range of stunning collections to suit every style and budget, this store is the ultimate destination for all your jewellery needs. From exquisite bridal collections to elegant everyday designs, Malabar Gold & Diamonds has it all. And with over 285 retail outlets across 10 countries, you’re never far from the most trusted and respected name in the jewellery industry.

But Malabar Gold & Diamonds is more than just a jewellery store – it’s a symbol of excellence and success, built on the foundation of trust, teamwork, and goodwill. Founded in 1993 by a team of enterprising entrepreneurs led by the visionary genius of Mr M P Ahammed, this company has grown into a formidable business conglomerate with a strong retail network and an annual turnover of $4.51 billion.

With 14 manufacturing units in India and GCC and 12 exclusive jewellery brands, Malabar Gold & Diamonds is dedicated to providing quality products and services to its customers. But the company’s commitment to excellence goes beyond its business operations – it’s also committed to corporate social responsibility, with a focus on health, education, women empowerment, housing, and the environment. By integrating ESG principles into its core business, Malabar Group strives to remain a socially conscious and responsible organization, contributing 5% of its profit to these initiatives in the same country of operation.

For bridal jewellery, Aabushan offers an amazing and exquisite diamond collection. Antique jewellery is also out of this world. The enthusiastic staff provide warm and attentive service to ensure customers are always satisfied.

Mr Jitendar and his Jewellery pride themselves on astonishing their customers with classic antiques and heritage jewellery never before seen. With a reputation and legacy spanning 80 years, Aabushan has earned the trust, loyalty and appreciation of its customers.

Kanika Jewels is a one-of-a-kind jewellery store that provides its customers with an exceptional experience. They take pride in their unique approach of converting your dream into a stunning piece of jewellery crafted to perfection with the finest quality materials at the best rates. You work alongside their in-house designers to bring your dream design to life, choosing from a range of options such as diamond quality, stone colours, and 18K or 22K gold.

Their specialized karigars and trained designers work with you to craft unique jewellery pieces that reflect your personality and style. Kanika Jewels offer the finest collection of authentic and hallmark jewellery with ace designs that leave you speechles

In conclusion, Bangalore has some of the finest jewellers in India, each with its own unique style and exceptional quality. Whether you’re looking for traditional gold and diamond jewellery or more modern and contemporary pieces, there is a jeweller in Bangalore to cater to your needs. From the grandeur of C. Krishniah Chetty Jewellers to the uniqueness of Kanika, the skill and expertise of these top 10 jewellers is truly remarkable.
